remarks: Subtraction in a free module.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)
statement:
frlmsubval.y $e |- Y = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmsubval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
frlmsubval.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
frlmsubval.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
frlmsubval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
frlmsubval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
frlmsubval.a $e |- .- = ( -g ` R ) $.
frlmsubval.p $e |- M = ( -g ` Y ) $.
frlmsubgval $p |- ( ph -> ( F M G ) = ( F oF .- G ) ) $.
